GSD.product_version: versions from v3.15 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
i2c: cadence: Support PEC for SMBus block read

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit e2c9b875ba1aa616e0d887734307bee63e08a7cd, it was introduced in version v3.15 by commit df8eb5691c48d3b03b918bdf065caa59c4281cdc. For more details please see the references link.
